summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 15, replat of block 15, Woodlawn Addition to Green Lake, being the alley between East Green Lake Way, Woodlawn Avenue, East 72nd Street and Maple Leaf Place; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 109375 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
